channel.title: Alive on Sriram Viswanathan
channel.description: Recent content in Alive on Sriram Viswanathan

item.title: What Surrounds
item.description:
Hero,  want me...
Trying hard to please...
What is that you read
Add it towards
The thoughts we breathe

Come alive now...
To know the cards
To know the wars...

Don't stop to color
The mind, the calm
How we wound

Wait, step forward,  wait
Delay the hours
Delay the thought

Truth gives up
The truth surrounds
A step,  a two
We all come around...

item.title: Fade In
item.description:
Fade into to you...
I am fading too soon...
I am waiting for you...
Turning still...
I am leaning in...
I am alive....

Farther and deeper into a dream...
You've become more alive...

Than what could be seen.
